channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Jitsi Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Jitsi Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2024-3978|2024-07-17T14:29:27.669Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20jitsi%20shortcode
item.description: The WordPress Jitsi Shortcode WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-3978|2024-06-14T06:00:03.710Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20jitsi%20shortcode
item.description: The WordPress Jitsi Shortcode WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-3977|2024-06-14T06:00:03.530Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20jitsi%20shortcode
item.description: The WordPress Jitsi Shortcode WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
